profile:
My name is Sylvain and I am originally from Quebec City. I have lived, worked and played in the Bow Valley since 1999. And now I am lucky enough to be raising my two young children here with my beautiful wife Ivona.

I started my window cleaning business in 2006 and am very proud to be beginning our 15th year in business. I take great pride in the work we do and it shows. I have developed a large customer-base made up of residential and commercial clients and have a very high ratio of repeat business. Our goal is to provide you with excellent customer service and an outstanding job well done.

We will impress you with our services!

Sylvain Bergeron

Lookout Window Cleaning

403-678-7802
lookout.wc@gmail.com
